heading: Epidemiological and Statistical Measures
text:
Unless otherwise stated, formulas used compute prevalence confidence intervals calculated following National Birth Defects Prevention Network (NBDPN) guidelines, chapter 8:\[
\substack{\text{Prevalence} \\ \\ \text{birth}} = 1,000 \times \dfrac{\text{Number cases birth defect area time period}}{\text{Number live births stillbirths area time period}}
\]Pregnancy outcomes included - cases numerator derived pregnancy outcomes collected program may include:
Live births.
Stillbirths.
Termination pregnancy (ToP): fetal losses \(< 20\) weeks gestation congenital anomalies.
